text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 87.1. Apney buhat hi buland Allah kay nam ki pakizgi biyan ker 87.2. Jissney paida kiya aur sahi salim banaya 87.3. Aur jiss na(thek thak)andaza kiya aur phir rah dekhai 87.4. Aur jis nay taza ghass paida ki
